TopicTitle: KSP - How To Build A Space Plane - Quick Start Guide - By Kyle Kidd

Articles.Content:
Having trouble getting your space-plane to take off? Check out my quick start guide: http://youtu.be/cMAje5KUQRw

One of the most important things for making a successful space plane is to make sure your lift and mass are on top of each other.

The plane should be symmetrical; and if you have more than 1 engine, make sure they can be toggled off and on at the same time via action groups.

Please SUBSCRIBE so you don't miss out on more spotlights, reviews, and Let's Plays: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=spectorkidd
